articles.description:
Brendan Rodgers cut a relaxed figure when he faced the press alongside Celtic’s latest signing, Kasper Schmeichel ahead of the Man City game. The Danish goalkeeper has been reunited with Rodgers after their Leicester days together. A quick scan across Celtic websites on Celtic News Now and some of the headlines would suggest that some […]
